locations.title: Schatz Crossroads Truck Stop
locations.content: Schatz Crossroads Truck Stop may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: Shower was good, and the guy who served me was very friendly.  I don't know what happened in the kitchen but they immediately brought me my food. Like way to quick.  The steak was as cold as a refrigerator in the center, and the outside was ‚Ä¶

I feel like when paying $13 for a shower this is not how it should look. This was my second time here and the first time it was somewhat clean but this time was awful. Hair in the shower, the toilet not clean. Toothpaste in the sink. I ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ Saturday.... all I got was attitude... I paid for a shower this morning... they gave me keys to #2, I walked up stairs and it was still dirty with the previous person's dirty towels... I went back down stairs and they finally had keys ‚Ä¶
‚Ä¶ Shower and bathrooms were clean and the store has an assortment of goodies.

‚Ä¶ wasnt bad though I just wish it had a creamy texture. The lady however seemed very nice she didnt seem to know anything but she said they were homemade which was not true. I would enjoy coming back here for a shower and the polite workers!
Filled 125 gallons+ and wanted a shower.  Excuses at the fuel desk why one of the two gals can‚Äôt clean one.  Smiling like happy not to have to do it.  Okay.  I‚Äôll have to pay for one later.

‚Ä¶ But, my real problem was when, this morning, I came in to get a shower. Showed both my Roady's card and a fuel receipt (from a couple of days ago at another Roady's). They refused both. I was told I had to purchase fuel HERE and, on this ‚Ä¶
Shower was awesome lots of parking but if you want something to eat you better have 2 hours to wait for your food
Excellent. Clean hot shower, good sit down restaurant, laundry mat, truck repair shop, plenty of truck parking. Nice people here.
Great truck stop good shower great food clean too.

locations.title: Flying J Travel Center
locations.content: Flying J Travel Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: I want to give a big shoutout to Tom, who works at Flying J in Minot. He is truly one of the best when it comes to keeping the place clean and organized. Tom is the only one who truly understands the value of a truck driver‚Äôs time. He ‚Ä¶

I can confirm that it is not an ideal stop for truck drivers, especially near the border, not a driver-friendly place. Shower availability is a Major issue ‚Äî wait times can be several hours ‚Äî and the customer service leaves much to be desired. Overall busy location,not okay for truckers and their service is poor.

The worst flying j in America. No deff available all the time. No showers available ever because they dont have anyone to clean them. Fuel cars don‚Äôt work on the pumps. No personal at the subway half the time. Bad fuel in the winter due to not replacing filters at the pumps.

i hate this travel center.  talk about incompetence.  tried to take a shower over the weekend.  no such luck as all was dirty.  this travel center never has hot food for us truckers.  the trash can outside by subway was so full it was ‚Ä¶

I have no clue about what is happening with this place????
I went for a shower at 4.30 am on sunday 18th May 2025 after a layover. They had no showers cleaned. I said I will wait until 1 gets cleaned. She said OKAY. ‚Ä¶

I had a 10 hour stay there and I waited 5 hours just for a shower and they never get cleaned. I asked the cashier for assistance and he said he didn‚Äôt have time for it and that no one ever cleans it and this is a recurring problem happens all the time

locations.title: Flying J Dealer
locations.content: Flying J Dealer may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: A place that openly allows overnight car parking for up to 36 hours, a great easy on/off the highway location to rest for the night. Restrooms are located just inside the front doors, it has normal convenience store items, and a full service 24 hours/day restaurant inside as well. 5 üåü!! ‚Ä¶

Easy parking, and 24 hour sit down dinner. This establishment truly understands the needs of travelers.  The facilities are impeccably maintained and offer a welcome respite from the road.  The staff provides friendly and efficient service, ‚Ä¶

Clean showers water very hotü•µüî•
Hot coffee
Big parking lot dirt lot and paved lot ‚Ä¶

This gem is located in the heart of farm country! Plenty of car/truck/RV parking. Busy with locals and travelers, it stays quiet. Subway, Rolling Hills Restaurant and Pizza. Hot showers. Staff was friendly all the way around. "Be a Beacon of light so others can find their way. Safe and happy travels!" Be'Be'

One of the best flying j been to in while
Showers were actually  clean
The Rolling Hills restaurant connected to the place is well worth eating at ‚Ä¶

Pretty nice for being way out in the middle of nowhere.  Plenty of gas station and convenience store Items as well as showers, laundry and lounge for truckers.  Has a restaurant, pizza place and Subway.   Car and truck fueling and a truck scale
Stopped in while getting my car washed/cleaned. A nice assortment of items. The gentleman at checkout was very upbeat. Great customer service.

locations.title: Sterling Travel Plaza
locations.content: Sterling Travel Plaza may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: Very clean store and restrooms! Ladys were very friendly at the register and an absolutely wonderful sunset to top it all off! I will definitely be back!

Awesome Truck Stop. Nice and quiet, lots of room to park. Clean showers with hot water just for $5. Super nice employees. Good store, stocked up on frozen food and beer, hot coffee and sandwiches as well as couple of soups. Tables and chairs available for inside dining. Had no problem to do my 34 in here.

Support local! Clean, friendly, hot, fresh food and plenty of parking. I'd stay here any time!
Edit: bought a shower based on other reviews, spotless and smells clean as can be!

Makes me wish I went through North Dakota a lot more often! I was stuck here during several days of bad weather, and it was a very fortunate place to get stuck. Restrooms always clean and well stocked. Shower was spacious, clean, and water ‚Ä¶

I read reviews about the showers being good here and reasonably priced, so I gave it a go.  Everything looked newer and clean.  I'm glad I tried it.  Service was good and atmosphere was good.  Definitely five stars!
Friendly service. Super clean shower.

Nice location size for the area.  They have a good selection and are a clean business.  Service is what you would expect.  There have been a few times that I've been there where it was hard to find a cashier but I've never had to wait more ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText:
Its a very nice place.  Clean inside...huge parking lot and friendly staff.
The reason for 3 stars is the price of their food...yes..the price on that sandwich is correct!! ‚Ä¶

The amenities aren‚Äôt so bad.Well supplied store with the basic foods and snacks. They have cold beverages and beer as well. They have a small casino area with a pool table. The laundry is $ 2 dollars to wash and dry per load. The showers are FREE and pretty well clean. So it‚Äôll work for my next stop by and would recommend to all!!üëçüèªüëçüèª ‚Ä¶
